channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Survivors seek a reckoning as FBI investigates child sex abuse in little-known Christian sect
item.description: A small Christian sect that for decades was little noticed by the outside world has found itself riven by a very public child sex abuse scandal.

item.title: 7 tourists hospitalized after drinking cocktails at 5-star resort
item.description: They fell ill after drinking pina colada cocktails prepared at a bar in the five-star Warwick Fiji resort on the Coral Coast, officials said.
